AltName.entry: FRIENDS OF THE WESTERN BUDDHIST ORDER (FWBO), SHEFFIELD - FORMER NAME

Desc.entry: Supports practice and teaching by local members of the Western Buddhist Order, a non-monastic order which respects all Buddhist traditions yet practises appropriately to the modern world. Introductory classes are provided in simple meditations for tranquillity and friendliness. Also offers basic and advanced courses in Buddhism. Runs yoga, tai chi and chigung classes.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Please telephone or check website for details of meditation classes, tai chi, yoga and chigung courses
